doc.knownrelatives: Charles Xavier (Professor X, father), Gabrielle Haller (mother), Dr. Brian Xavier (paternal grandfather, deceased), Sharon Xavier (paternal grandmother, deceased), Cassandra Nova (paternal aunt), Cain Marko (Juggernaut, stepuncle)
doc.powers:
Telekinesis, Pyrokinesis, Telepathy, ability to absorb the consciousness of others.  In addition Legion demonstrated the psionic abilities of time-travel, shape-shifting, and formation of a psychic knife. 
Note: The manifestation of Legion's individual powers were generally associated with his different personalities. The Jack Wayne personality used telekinesis, Cyndi was a pyrokinetic, and Jemail Karami was a telepath.
